mapper.select: SELECT wsno, main_poster, goods_title, score, maker_name, price, num FROM (SELECT wsno, main_poster, goods_title, score, maker_name, price, rownum as num FROM (SELECT wsno, main_poster, goods_title, score, maker_name, price FROM wadiz_store_detail ORDER BY wsno ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN 1 AND 6

SELECT wfno, mainimg, fcname, makername, fcno, tag, ftitle, achieve_rate, parti_count, TO_CHAR(openday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as stropenday, TO_CHAR(endday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as strendday, aim_amount, hit, num FROM ( SELECT wfno, mainimg, fcname, makername, fcno, tag, ftitle, achieve_rate, parti_count, openday, endday, aim_amount, hit, rownum AS num FROM ( SELECT wfno, mainimg, fcname, makername, fcno, tag, ftitle, achieve_rate, parti_count, openday, endday, aim_amount, hit FROM WADIZ_FUND_DETAIL ORDER BY hit DESC, wfno ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN 1 AND 6
SELECT fcname FROM ( SELECT fcname FROM WADIZ_TASTE WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY taste_num DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT wfno, mainimg, fcname, makername, fcno, tag, ftitle, achieve_rate, parti_count, TO_CHAR(openday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as stropenday, TO_CHAR(endday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as strendday, aim_amount, hit, num FROM ( SELECT wfno, mainimg, fcname, makername, fcno, tag, ftitle, achieve_rate, parti_count, openday, endday, aim_amount, hit, rownum AS num FROM ( SELECT wfno, mainimg, fcname, makername, fcno, tag, ftitle, achieve_rate, parti_count, openday, endday, aim_amount, hit FROM WADIZ_FUND_DETAIL WHERE fcname = #{fcname} ORDER BY hit DESC, wfno ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN 1 AND 6
